issue.title: [JS] Document JavaScript release management
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2323](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2323). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JavaScript post-vote release management process is not documented. For example, there is certain NPM-related steps required to be able to publish artifacts after the release vote has taken place.
